scripts.start: npm run heroku-postbuild &&  npm run prodServer
scripts.prodServer: cd packages/backend && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js &&  nodemon src/index.js --ext js  --exec babel-node
scripts.buildProdWeb: cd packages/frontend && npm run build && rm -R ../backend/dist/public && rm ../backend/dist/index.html && mkdir ../backend/dist/public && cp -R build/*.* ../backend/dist/public && cp -R build/static ../backend/dist/public/static && mv ../backend/dist/public/index.html ../backend/dist
scripts.heroku-postbuild: yarn install && cd packages/frontend && yarn install && npm run build && rm -R ../backend/dist/public && rm ../backend/dist/index.html && mkdir ../backend/dist/public && cp -R build/*.* ../backend/dist/public && cp -R build/static ../backend/dist/public/static && mv ../backend/dist/public/index.html ../backend/dist
